dict.acceptation: 独立，自主；足够维持闭居生活的收入；独立心；自恃心；

sent.orig: Principle of judicial independence refers to justice independence and procuratorial independence in China.
sent.trans: 司法独立原则在我国是指司法权独立，即独立审判和独立检察。

sent.orig: This paper respectively introduces the concepts of CPA independence, auditing organization independence, nongovernmental auditing profession independence.
sent.trans: 本文拟分别探讨民间审计三个主体即注册会计师、审计组织和民间审计职业独立性的内涵。

sent.orig: Judicial independence includes independence of courts and independence of judges.
sent.trans: 司法独立和法官独立审判是案件得到公正审判的前提条件。

sent.orig: With her great efforts Alexandra attains finally not only spiritual independence but also economic independence.
sent.trans: 第二部分阐述了亚历山德拉通过自身奋斗获得精神独立和经济独立的过程。

sent.orig: Without economic independence, no country can achieve complete independence.
sent.trans: 没有经济上的独立，一个国家不能实现完全独立。
